channel.title: GitHub Trending - Python (Monthly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Python nel periodo monthly

item.title: 🐍 coleam00/context-engineering-intro (7237 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: coleam00

📝 Repository: coleam00/context-engineering-intro

📄 Descrizione: Context engineering is the new vibe coding - it's the way to actually make AI coding assistants work. Claude Code is the best for this so that's what this repo is centered around, but you can apply this strategy with any AI coding assistant!

⭐ Stelle: 7237

🍴 Forks: 1457

💻 Linguaggio: Python

📜 Licenza: MIT License

⏰ Creato il: 2025-07-02T11:54:47Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-07-27T03:19:31Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>

item.title: 🐍 davidkimai/Context-Engineering (3569 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: davidkimai

📝 Repository: davidkimai/Context-Engineering

📄 Descrizione: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.

⭐ Stelle: 3569

🍴 Forks: 357

💻 Linguaggio: Python

📜 Licenza: MIT License

⏰ Creato il: 2025-06-29T00:16:36Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-07-27T03:07:24Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>
